formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1. Tangent slope at \(x = x_0\): \(m_t = f'(x_0)\) 2. Tangent line: \(y - y_0 = m_t (x - x_0)\) 3. Normal slope: \(m_n = -\frac{1}{m_t}\) (if \(m_t \neq 0\)) 4. Normal line: \(y - y_0 = m_n (x - x_0)\) 5. Horizontal tangent \(m_t = 0\) → normal is vertical: \(x = x_0\) 6. Vertical tangent (rare; infinite slope) → normal is horizontal: \(y = y_0\)
